overview: It's a story of friendship - two girls - they have nothing but their friendship. Tina is ill. Alix isn't supposed to know it, but she does. They decided to dress up, to follow their dreams. With Pippo the dog. Alix has a secret project. They get picked up hitchhiking by Felix, a nice young guy. Alix surprises his girlfriend being raped by Felix, she knocks him out. Tina gets angry, she was consenting. They discover in the trunk of FÃ©lix's car a nest egg of 300,000 Euros. This is where the trouble will start.
title: Wet Dogs
